resources.string: Blackout gives you an upper bound of your alcohol level in gram of pure alcohol per L of blood. It also let you add memories of your night as photos in case you would like to remember what you have done. Be aware that from the moment your start recording your alcohol consumption, the app groups every drink you input for 12h before letting you start another party. \n \n Lastly, we remind you that excessive alcohol consumption is harmful for you health and can damage your liver, brain, nervous system, heart, muscles and digestive.

There are 3 ways to input your drinks the pint of beer, the wine glass and the shot of hard. The quantities are standard and listed below : 
 • Beer: 50cL of a 6% beer
 • Wine: 12.5cL of a 13% wine
 • Shot: 5cl of a 40% hard alcohol
 
 The amount of pure alcohol, in gram, for a drink is computed as : 
 pureAlcohol = (8 * degree * amountCL) / 100 
 (note: the number 8 comes from the density of pure alcohol as 1L of pure alcohol weights 800 grams) 
 
 To derive the quantity of alcohol that you have in your blood, we need two more variables: 
 • your weight 
 • you sex 
 
 Be aware that our model does not take into account if you have eaten or not (which delays the arrival of alcohol in your blood). Furthermore, it does not use the decay of alcohol in your blood either. Therefore, it is an upper bound of the true level of alcohol in your blood. 
 
 The formula to compute the quantity is: 
 quantityAlcoholInBlood = pureAlcoholDrank / (yourWeight * sexFactor) 
 
 The sexFactor is a constant which equals 0.7 for men and 0.6 for women.

Your personal information is stored locally and totally inacessible from the creator of this app, feel free to enter your REAL weight. Though you can lie on your age, it is not currently used by the app.
